items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: LiteBot is a minimal, multilingual chatbot built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — no backend, no APIs, no frameworks. It supports both Turkish and English, offers dark mode, sound notifications, and fully local scripted responses via JSON. Ideal for personal sites, demos, or lightweight integrations where simplicity and speed matter most.
items.title: emiryuksel/LiteBot: LiteBot is a minimal, multilingual chatbot built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — no backend, no APIs, no frameworks. It supports both Turkish and English, offers dark mode, sound notifications, and fully local scripted responses via JSON. Ideal for personal sites, demos, or lightweight integrations where simplicity and speed matter most.

items.content_html: A simple Stone Paper Scissors game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Players choose a move, and the computer picks randomly. The game displays results instantly with a score tracker. Lightweight, responsive, and easy to play. Just open in a browser and enjoy!
items.title: Prabhash00/stone-paper-scissor-game: A simple Stone Paper Scissors game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Players choose a move, and the computer picks randomly. The game displays results instantly with a score tracker. Lightweight, responsive, and easy to play. Just open in a browser and enjoy!
